channel.title: pipenv on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in pipenv on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: pipenv install 报错
item.description: 在某个项目中遇到了出错，如下： (saleor) ➜ saleor git:(master) pipenv install --dev Courtesy Notice: Pipenv found itself running within a virtual environment, so it will automatically use that environment, instead of creating its own for any project. You can set PIPENV_IGNORE_VIRTUALENVS =1 to force pipenv to ignore that environment and create its own instead. You can set PIPENV_VERBOSITY=-1 to suppress this warning. Installing dependencies from Pipfile.lock (0c0b26)… An error occurred while installing yarl==1.3.0 ; python_version >= '3.
